question: Analyze the trends in social media engagement for companies in the technology sector.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology sector to focus the analysis on relevant entities.
Extract social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) from various social media tables for the selected technology companies.
Aggregate the extracted social media engagement data to identify trends and patterns over time for these companies.
Analyze the relationship between social media engagement and financial performance metrics of the identified technology companies (such as revenue and net income).
